attributes.action: Petition to have FULL disclosure on the Extraterrestrial & UFO issue from the british government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As most people know, goverments of the world are witholding information portraying to the existence of extraterrestrial life on this planet. While disclosure on this issue is very close it is upto us the people to pry this information from them. Please sign the petition to do your part for this monumental cause. Many Thanks

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
